requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7-win10
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win7-win10
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Soundblaster
